content.raw: Hi @{557058:6c52d6e5-77e0-41a8-8b6e-cb9462f4d5f1} , just to clarify, for `perception world 1` provided in phase 2, the last 2 objects are red surmark objects but the the actual objects reported by the plugin are red\_totem, resulting in 0 score. Is this a typo? Not sure if this was clarified elsewhere. Just want to ensure that there is no issue with the way we are reporting our perception objects. Thanks
content.html: Hi @Brian Bingham , just to clarify, for perception world 1 provided in phase 2, the last 2 objects are red surmark objects but the the actual objects reported by the plugin are red_totem, resulting in 0 score. Is this a typo? Not sure if this was clarified elsewhere. Just want to ensure that there is no issue with the way we are reporting our perception objects. Thanks
